function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"A wider spread disruption such as a continental-wide pandemic could impact a variety of locations and stakeholders.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of the supply chain to major external disruptions and changes in performance.","Mitigation":"Enhance the robustness of the network topology and supply chain characteristics to minimize the impact of disruptions.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, network optimization tools.","People":"Stakeholders in the supply chain, including manufacturers, distributors, and end consumers.","Owner":"Supply chain management professionals, policymakers, and government agencies."},{"Description":"Characteristics of the supply chain, including logistic operations, network structure, dynamics, and complexity, determine the way major external disruptions may change performance within the supply chain.","Impact":"Potential for changes in logistic operations, supply chain structure, and the intensity of disruptions.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to improve logistics, optimize network structure, and manage the complexity of supply chains.","Technologies":"Logistics management systems, network modeling software, supply chain complexity analysis tools.","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics professionals, supply chain analysts.","Owner":"Supply chain management professionals, technology developers, and researchers."},{"Description":"Interactions among supply chain stakeholders drive decision-making and actions, impacting the frequency, intensity, duration, and spread patterns of disruptions.","Impact":"Influences decision-making and actions, affecting the frequency, intensity, and duration of disruptions.","Mitigation":"Improve communication and collaboration among supply chain stakeholders, enhance decision-making processes, and establish contingency plans for disruptions.","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, decision support systems, supply chain communication tools.","People":"Supply chain stakeholders, including manufacturers, suppliers, and distributors.","Owner":"Supply chain managers, business leaders, and organizational stakeholders."}]}
